<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Do extensive, expensive, basic correctness checking.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DAGTypeLegalizer::PerformExpensiveChecks() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If a node is not processed, then none of its values should be mapped by any</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of PromotedIntegers, ExpandedIntegers, ..., ReplacedValues.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If a node is processed, then each value with an illegal type must be mapped</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// by exactly one of PromotedIntegers, ExpandedIntegers, ..., ReplacedValues.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Values with a legal type may be mapped by ReplacedValues, but not by any of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the other maps.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note that these invariants may not hold momentarily when processing a node:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the node being processed may be put in a map before being marked Processed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note that it is possible to have nodes marked NewNode in the DAG.  This can</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// occur in two ways.  Firstly, a node may be created during legalization but</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// never passed to the legalization core.  This is usually due to the implicit</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// folding that occurs when using the DAG.getNode operators.  Secondly, a new</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// node may be passed to the legalization core, but when analyzed may morph</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// into a different node, leaving the original node as a NewNode in the DAG.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A node may morph if one of its operands changes during analysis.  Whether</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// it actually morphs or not depends on whether, after updating its operands,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// it is equivalent to an existing node: if so, it morphs into that existing</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// node (CSE).  An operand can change during analysis if the operand is a new</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// node that morphs, or it is a processed value that was mapped to some other</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// value (as recorded in ReplacedValues) in which case the operand is turned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// into that other value.  If a node morphs then the node it morphed into will</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// be used instead of it for legalization, however the original node continues</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to live on in the DAG.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The conclusion is that though there may be nodes marked NewNode in the DAG,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// all uses of such nodes are also marked NewNode: the result is a fungus of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// NewNodes growing on top of the useful nodes, and perhaps using them, but</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// not used by them.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If a value is mapped by ReplacedValues, then it must have no uses, except</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// by nodes marked NewNode (see above).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The final node obtained by mapping by ReplacedValues is not marked NewNode.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note that ReplacedValues should be applied iteratively.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note that the ReplacedValues map may also map deleted nodes (by iterating</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// over the DAG we never dereference deleted nodes).  This means that it may</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// also map nodes marked NewNode if the deallocated memory was reallocated as</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// another node, and that new node was not seen by the LegalizeTypes machinery</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (for example because it was created but not used).  In general, we cannot</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// distinguish between new nodes and deleted nodes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;SDNode&#42;, 16&gt;</a> NewNodes;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> : DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#ab01e38173337b53d794086a134845c0d">allnodes</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Remember nodes marked NewNode - they are subject to extra checking below.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This is the main entry point for the type legalizer. This does a top-down</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// non-leaves.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getNumValues() == M-&gt;getNumValues() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Replacing the value takes care of remapping the new value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise, this node is new: this is the first operand of it that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// became ready.  Its new NodeId is the number of operands it has minus 1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (as this node is now processed).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NodeId == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagtypelegalizer/#ab1ef8198b3a82d5a2161eb72f5910994acc58a6895ccc71b318f6eb9bd6a17ac2">Unanalyzed</a> &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Unknown node ID!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a>-&gt;setNodeId(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user/#addec638786f763d967811b45cb662f1f">getNumOperands</a>() - 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the node only has a single operand, it is now ready.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user/#addec638786f763d967811b45cb662f1f">getNumOperands</a>() == 1)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The specified node is the root of a subtree of potentially new nodes.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Correct any processed operands (this may change the node) and calculate the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><Highlight kind="comment">/// NodeId. If the node itself changes to a processed node, it is not remapped -</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the caller needs to take care of this. Returns the potentially changed node.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42;DAGTypeLegalizer::AnalyzeNewNode(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If this was an existing node that is already done, we&#39;re done.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getNodeId() != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagtypelegalizer/#ab1ef8198b3a82d5a2161eb72f5910994a8538ef2e6f2a154d8fb2032f068a3ed8">NewNode</a> &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getNodeId() != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagtypelegalizer/#ab1ef8198b3a82d5a2161eb72f5910994acc58a6895ccc71b318f6eb9bd6a17ac2">Unanalyzed</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Okay, we know that this node is new.  Recursively walk all of its operands</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to see if they are new also.  The depth of this walk is bounded by the size</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of the new tree that was constructed (usually 2-3 nodes), so we don&#39;t worry</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// about revisiting of nodes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// As we walk the operands, keep track of the number of nodes that are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// processed.  If non-zero, this will become the new nodeid of this node.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Operands may morph when they are analyzed.  If so, the node will be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// updated after all operands have been analyzed.  Since this is rare,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the code tries to minimize overhead in the non-morphing case.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;SDValue&gt; NewOps;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumProcessed = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0, e = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getNumOperands(); i != e; ++i) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> OrigOp = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getOperand(i);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> = OrigOp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><Highlight kind="normal">    AnalyzeNewValue(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>); </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Op may morph.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.getNode()-&gt;getNodeId() == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagtypelegalizer/#ab1ef8198b3a82d5a2161eb72f5910994af6b7630aca04cca9a65516a381267417">Processed</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><Highlight kind="normal">      ++NumProcessed;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!NewOps.empty()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Some previous operand changed.  Add this one to the list.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><Highlight kind="normal">      NewOps.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> != OrigOp) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is the first operand to change - add all operands so far.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><Highlight kind="normal">      NewOps.insert(NewOps.end(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;op&#95;begin(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;op&#95;begin() + i);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><Highlight kind="normal">      NewOps.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-legalizetypes-cpp-/nodeupdatelistener/#acf34249f3e61610c017c54e3445dda14"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-legalizetypes-cpp-/nodeupdatelistener/#acf34249f3e61610c017c54e3445dda14">NodeUpdated</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> override </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Node updates can mean pretty much anything.  It is possible that an</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// operand was set to something already processed (f.e.) in which case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// this node could become ready.  Recompute its flags.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getNodeId() != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagtypelegalizer/#ab1ef8198b3a82d5a2161eb72f5910994a5c4b2709df114f7ca7344a9e264ca9b8">DAGTypeLegalizer::ReadyToProcess</a> &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The specified value was legalized to the specified other value.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Update the DAG and NodeIds replacing any uses of From to use To instead.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DAGTypeLegalizer::ReplaceValueWith(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> From, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> To) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(From.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>() != To.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Potential legalization loop!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If expansion produced new nodes, make sure they are properly marked.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><Highlight kind="normal">  AnalyzeNewValue(To);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Anything that used the old node should now use the new one.  Note that this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// can potentially cause recursive merging.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><Highlight kind="normal">  SmallSetVector&lt;SDNode&#42;, 16&gt; NodesToAnalyze;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><Highlight kind="normal">  NodeUpdateListener NUL(&#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, NodesToAnalyze);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">do</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The old node may be present in a map like ExpandedIntegers or</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// PromotedIntegers. Inform maps about the replacement.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FromId = getTableId(From);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ToId = getTableId(To);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (FromId != ToId)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><Highlight kind="normal">      ReplacedValues&#91;FromId&#93; = ToId;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><Highlight kind="normal">    DAG.ReplaceAllUsesOfValueWith(From, To);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Process the list of nodes that need to be reanalyzed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!NodesToAnalyze.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/setvector/#ac178f4fc4e4a0642610c374256b9fb27">empty</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><Highlight kind="normal">      SDNode &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> = NodesToAnalyze.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/setvector/#af9880d625c506aacc716ee1c9a29ff8b">pop&#95;back&#95;val</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The node was analyzed while reanalyzing an earlier node - it is safe</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to skip.  Note that this is not a morphing node - otherwise it would</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><Highlight kind="normal">      SDNode &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a> = AnalyzeNewNode(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The node morphed into a different node.  Make everyone use the new</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> DAGTypeLegalizer::CreateStackStoreLoad(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><Highlight kind="normal">                                               <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> DestVT) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"><Highlight kind="normal">  SDLoc dl(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Create the stack frame object.  Make sure it is aligned for both</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the source and destination types.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In cases where the vector is illegal it will be broken down into parts</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and stored in parts - we should use the alignment for the smallest part.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/kernel/arg/key/#a6b334a5f83504ebc99cc59f4f333ff98">Align</a> DestAlign = DAG.getReducedAlign(DestVT, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;UseABI=&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/kernel/arg/key/#a6b334a5f83504ebc99cc59f4f333ff98">Align</a> OpAlign = DAG.getReducedAlign(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.getValueType(), </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;UseABI=&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="903"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/kernel/arg/key/#a6b334a5f83504ebc99cc59f4f333ff98">Align</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/kernel/arg/key/#a6b334a5f83504ebc99cc59f4f333ff98">Align</a> = std::max(DestAlign, OpAlign);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#aa8c11d016a2dd473a4cf0ed1da777f5eaf80f5476044d70697d689c8f32415ce9">StackPtr</a> =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><Highlight kind="normal">      DAG.CreateStackTemporary(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.getValueType().getStoreSize(), Align);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Emit a store to the stack slot.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/spii/#ad2b7483c625986ac800ae1c31ae4cce7a36b3dd3b84fde3f8494a9b18af131856">Store</a> = DAG.getStore(DAG.getEntryNode(), dl, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>, StackPtr,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"><Highlight kind="normal">                               MachinePointerInfo(), Align);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Result is a load from the stack slot.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DAG.getLoad(DestVT, dl, Store, StackPtr, MachinePointerInfo(), Align);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Replace the node&#39;s results with custom code provided by the target and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><Highlight kind="comment">/// return &quot;true&quot;, or do nothing and return &quot;false&quot;.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The last parameter is FALSE if we are dealing with a node with legal</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><Highlight kind="comment">/// result types and illegal operand. The second parameter denotes the type of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"><Highlight kind="comment">/// illegal OperandNo in that case.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="918"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The last parameter being TRUE means we are dealing with a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919"><Highlight kind="comment">/// node with illegal result types. The second parameter denotes the type of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><Highlight kind="comment">/// illegal ResNo in that case.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
